title.rendered: “IDF and Shin Bet Crack Down on Terrorist Financing: Key Takeaways from the Central Command Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces, the Israel Police, the Shin Bet, and the Counter-Terrorism Bureau operated throughout the Central Command in a widespread operation to seize terrorist funds and technological equipment.

As part of the IDF and Shin Bet’s expanded efforts to prevent terrorist financing in the Central Command, the security forces investigated numerous suspects last night and acted to confiscate the terrorist funds they possessed. This was part of an intelligence investigation and directive of the Centre Command, the Shin Bet, and the Israel Police.
Additionally, the forces located and seized numerous documents and technological equipment.

As part of this operation, undercover Border Police from the Judea and Samaria units eliminated three terrorists who had hidden explosives in the Tulkarm area in the Menashe sector.
Moreover, forces fired at a number of additional terrorists spotted in Tulkarm and Qalqilya in the Ephraim sector and hits were identified. Two suspects were arrested during the operation.

The arrested suspects and seized combat assets have been transferred for further handling by security forces, our forces suffered no casualties.

Attached is footage from the operation: https://bit.ly/4dHJFKi

Attached is footage from commander 9213 on the topic: https://bit.ly/4dKrDaA

Attached are photos from the forces’ activity: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1605202498427496.
